articles.description: North America and Asia might collide to form next supercontinent on Earth, predicts scientist
articles.content:
Today, we have seven continents, but an intriguing future awaits us. 
Geophysicist Ross Mitchell has recently unveiled his new book: "The Next Supercontinent" in which he talks about not only the pa… [+2228 chars]

articles.author: Shivani Naik
articles.title: India’s unstoppables: Satwiksairaj & Chirag Shetty bamboozle Liang King & Wang Chang to reach final of Korea Open - The Indian Express
articles.description: Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty will be in their fourth of the year after the Swiss Open, Asian Championships and Indonesia Open, all of which they have won.
articles.content: In a blazing show of power-hitting combined with canny placement, Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty scored their first victory over China’s Liang Wei Keng-Wang Chang in three meetings, to win… [+3539 chars]
